person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Ajax face AZ Alkmaar away on Sunday and Feyenoord , eliminated from the UEFA Cup after losing 4-2 on aggregate to Tenerife on Tuesday , travel to De Graafschap Doetinchem .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Ajax |
| AZ Alkmaar |
| Feyenoord |
| Tenerife |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions four teams, which are considered as "Person" entities in this context. The entities are named exactly as they appear in the paragraph.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Ajax face AZ Alkmaar away on Sunday and Feyenoord , eliminated from the UEFA Cup after losing 4-2 on aggregate to Tenerife on Tuesday , travel to De Graafschap Doetinchem .

Let's think step by step.

| Location |
| --- |
| Ajax's location (implied to be Amsterdam, Netherlands) |
| AZ Alkmaar's location (Alkmaar, Netherlands) |
| Feyenoord's location (implied to be Rotterdam, Netherlands) |
| De Graafschap Doetinchem's location (Doetinchem, Netherlands) |
| Tenerife's location (Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spain)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| Ajax's location (Amsterdam, Netherlands) |
| AZ Alkmaar's location (Alkmaar, Netherlands) |
| De Graafschap Doetinchem's location (Doetinchem, Netherlands)
| Tenerife's location (Canary Islands, Spain) |

Note: I assumed "implied to be" and "travel to" indicate locations. If "Ajax" and "Feyenoord" are assumed to be organizations rather than locations, then those rows should be removed.
